sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Container, Box, Card, CardContent, Grid, Button, Chip, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, IconButton, Alert, LinearProgress, Drawer, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, Divider, Avatar, Menu, Badge, MenuItem } from '@mui/material'; import { Add as AddIcon, Edit as EditIcon, Delete as DeleteIcon, Dashboard as DashboardIcon, Assignment as ProjectIcon, Group as TeamIcon, Settings as SettingsIcon, Notifications as NotificationsIcon, AccountCircle as AccountIcon, CheckCircle as CompleteIcon, Schedule as PendingIcon, PlayArrow as InProgressIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; // Types interface Project { id: string; name: string; description: string; status: 'planning' | 'in-progress' | 'completed' | 'on-hold'; priority: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' | 'critical'; progress: number; startDate: string; endDate: string; team: string[]; budget: number; technology: string[]; } function App() { // State Management const [projects, setProjects] = useState([]); const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('dashboard'); const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false); const [anchorEl, setAnchorEl] = useState(null); // Initialize demo data useEffect(() => { const demoProjects: Project[] = [ { id: '1', name: 'ROMI AI - Sistema de Gesti贸n', description: 'Plataforma integral de gesti贸n empresarial con IA', status: 'in-progress', priority: 'high', progress: 75, startDate: '2025-01-15', endDate: '2025-03-30', team: ['Ana Garc铆a', 'Carlos L贸pez', 'Mar铆a Rodr铆guez'], budget: 150000, technology: ['React', 'Node.js', 'Azure', 'MongoDB'] }, { id: '2', name: 'Portal Cliente ROMI', description: 'Interface web para clientes con dashboard personalizado', status: 'planning', priority: 'medium', progress: 25, startDate: '2025-02-01', endDate: '2025-04-15', team: ['Luis Mart铆n', 'Elena Vargas'], budget: 80000, technology: ['React', 'TypeScript', 'Material-UI'] }, { id: '3', name: 'API Gateway ROMI', description: 'Microservicios y API centralizada para todos los productos', status: 'completed', priority: 'critical', progress: 100, startDate: '2024-11-01', endDate: '2025-01-10', team: ['Roberto Kim', 'Sofia Chen', 'Diego Morales'], budget: 200000, technology: ['Node.js', 'Express', 'Azure Functions', 'Docker'] } ]; setProjects(demoProjects); }, []); // Helper Functions const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return 'success'; case 'in-progress': return 'primary'; case 'planning': return 'warning'; case 'on-hold': return 'error'; default: return 'default'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority: string) => { switch (priority) { case 'critical': return 'error'; case 'high': return 'warning'; case 'medium': return 'info'; case 'low': return 'success'; default: return 'default'; } }; const getStatusIcon = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return ; case 'in-progress': return ; case 'planning': return ; default: return ; } }; // Dashboard Component const DashboardView = () => ( {/* Metrics Cards */} {projects.length} Proyectos Activos {projects.filter(p => p.status === 'completed').length} Completados 12 Miembros del Equipo $430K Presupuesto Total {/* Recent Projects */} Proyectos Recientes Proyecto Estado Prioridad Progreso Equipo Acciones {projects.map((project) => ( {project.name} {project.description} {project.progress}% {project.team.slice(0, 3).map((member, index) => ( 0 ? -1 : 0 }} > {member.charAt(0)} ))} {project.team.length > 3 && ( +{project.team.length - 3} )} ))}
); // Navigation Drawer const NavigationDrawer = () => ( setDrawerOpen(false)} sx={{ '& .MuiDrawer-paper': { width: 280 } }} > ROMI AI Platform { setCurrentView('dashboard'); setDrawerOpen(false); }}> { setCurrentView('projects'); setDrawerOpen(false); }}> { setCurrentView('team'); setDrawerOpen(false); }}> { setCurrentView('settings'); setDrawerOpen(false); }}> ); return ( {/* App Bar */} setDrawerOpen(true)} sx={{ mr: 2 }} > ROMI AI - Gesti贸n de Proyectos setAnchorEl(e.currentTarget)} > {/* Navigation Drawer */} {/* Main Content */} {/* Welcome Alert */} 隆Bienvenido a ROMI AI Platform! Plataforma completa de gesti贸n de proyectos con infraestructura Azure robusta. {/* Content based on current view */} {currentView === 'dashboard' && } {currentView === 'projects' && ( Gesti贸n de Proyectos Vista completa de todos los proyectos en desarrollo )} {currentView === 'team' && ( Gesti贸n de Equipo Administraci贸n de miembros del equipo y roles )} {currentView === 'settings' && ( Configuraci贸n del Sistema Configuraci贸n de seguridad, accesos y preferencias )} {/* Footer */} 漏 2025 ROMI AI - Plataforma de Gesti贸n Empresarial {/* User Menu */} setAnchorEl(null)} > setAnchorEl(null)}>Mi Perfil setAnchorEl(null)}>Configuraci贸n setAnchorEl(null)}>Cerrar Sesi贸n ); } export default App;
